relproducts.title: Stirlo Olive Green
relproducts.description: Stirloolive green plain roller blind the stirlo range boast a fantastic range of dim-out privacy fabrics to compliment any room. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing.
